bounties.title: Severe Storms, Straight-Line Winds, Tornadoes, and Flooding Relief
bounties.description: FEMA has announced nearly $9 million in federal funding for Tennessee communities affected by Hurricane Helene and other past disasters.

bounties.title: Drought Impact on Blount County Farmers
bounties.description: Blount County farmers are seeing lower yields and profits due to drought conditions, threatening their livelihoods.
